org.jpedal.external

Interface GlyphTracker


  • public interface GlyphTracker
    allow user to recieve raw glyph data as generated

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGlyph(float[][] trm, int rawInt, String displayValue, String extractionValue)
      pass user the low-level details

    • Method Detail

      • addGlyph

        void addGlyph(float[][] trm,
              int rawInt,
              String displayValue,
              String extractionValue)
        pass user the low-level details
        Parameters:
        trm - - the Trm matrix (x,y is Trm[2][0], Trm[2][1]), other values are width (usually Trm[0][0] unless rotated when could be Trm[0][1]) and height (usually Trm[1][1] or sometimes Trm[1][0]) Trm is defined in PDF specification
        rawInt - - value found in TJ command (usually encoded)
        displayValue - - unicode display value from rawInt
        extractionValue - - unicode display value from rawInt
